body:
Hi John,
Hi Radiance group,


we will transfer the presentations as soon as possible to the web-site.
Unfortunately Sandra and I are sick and not at ISE (Hi Alstan... ;-) )
in the next days - so maybe next week.


Thanks to all presenters again - they made the workshop so interesting!


Best,


Jan
